title: What is the Dubai tennis schedule?
description: The two semi-final clashes of the 2025 Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships will be played on Friday with two-time finalist Stefanos Tsitsipas and Canadian Felix Auger-Aliassime among the stars in action on centre court.  The fourth-seeded Tsitsipas will take on Tallon Griekspoor, who saved four match points en route to defeating top seed Daniil Medvedev on Thursday. The first night-session match scheduled is Auger-Aliassime's contest against French qualifier Quentin Halys. View the full Dubai Friday order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 28 FEBRUARY 2025 Centre Court - start 1:00 PM [Q] Robin Haase (NED) / Hendrik Jebens (GER) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) Yuki Bhambri (IND) / Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs Jamie Murray (GBR) / John Peers (AUS) Not Before 5:00 PM [Q] Quentin Halys (FRA) vs Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN) Not Before 7:00 PM Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs [4] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Dubai

Tsitsipas, Auger-Aliassime in semi-final action on Friday at ATP 500

February 27, 2025

Christopher Pike/Getty Images

The 2025 Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships concludes on 1 March. By ATP Staff

The two semi-final clashes of the 2025 Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships will be played on Friday with two-time finalist Stefanos Tsitsipas and Canadian Felix Auger-Aliassime among the stars in action on centre court. 

The fourth-seeded Tsitsipas will take on Tallon Griekspoor, who saved four match points en route to defeating top seed Daniil Medvedev on Thursday. The first night-session match scheduled is Auger-Aliassime's contest against French qualifier Quentin Halys.

View the full Dubai Friday order of play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 28 FEBRUARY 2025
Centre Court - start 1:00 PM
[Q] Robin Haase (NED) / Hendrik Jebens (GER) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR)
Yuki Bhambri (IND) / Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs Jamie Murray (GBR) / John Peers (AUS)

Not Before 5:00 PM
[Q] Quentin Halys (FRA) vs Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN)
Not Before 7:00 PM
Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs [4] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE)
